title: [NEPAL] Expose all available Product Base Data
description:
Description
Context
As of today, NEPAL is the only source for all kind of products (devices, accessories, tariffs & options) which are sold to our business customers. Unfortunately the current interfaces are use case driven and providing the product data only for a specific RV & Process. As the headless CMS is intended to provide content (pictures & user-friendly descriptions) for all customers, the superset of products is required.
  This epic focuses on the blue marked interface:
      Which data must be offered
Technical Identifier (Tariff-Id, BaseProductId & Matchcode, Materialnumber, Offering Id)
Technical Name
acceptance_criteria: NEPAL exposes an interface which provides base data of all known products which are sold to business customers
